evidence.claim: Heavenly Care Home Care emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations on their website, indicating their handling of sensitive health data.
The company mentions utilization of EDI standards in their operations, indicating the use of specific transaction sets for healthcare.
Heavenly Care has references to FHIR standards in their service offerings, indicating that they may interact with health records and data exchange frameworks.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction or API automation use cases found.
